description: A switch widget that can be toggled.

selection.description: The checked state of the switch.

thumbOnColor.description: The color of the movable thumb, when switched *on*.

thumbOffColor.description: The color of the movable thumb, when switched *off*.

trackOnColor.description: The color of the track that holds the thumb, when switched *on*.

trackOffColor.description: The color of the track that holds the thumb, when switched *off*.

change:selection.description: Fired when the selection property changes.

select.description: Fired when the switch is toggled by the user.
